edu.harvard.integer.service.discovery.subnet

Class DiscoverNet

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.integer.service.discovery.subnet.DiscoverNet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DiscoverNet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Class DiscoverNet is used to specify which net or node for discovery or need to be excluded. There are two lists for discovery. One contains the nodes and another one contains net. The discover engine will start the discover on nodes first.
    See Also:
